name: Incompetent Bandit
description: A very incompetent bandit has tied someone to the tracks up ahead just beyond a railway junction. Currently, the junction is set so that the train will pass on the opposite track, leaving them unharmed. Should you do nothing, no harm will arise.

options.name: Human-Free Track
options.description: Empty track stretches into the distance.

options.name: Human-Laced Track
options.description: A lone human is tied immovably to the tracks. If you do nothing, the trolley will pass them by safely.
